item.description: On Thursday, September 22, starting at 7:30p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Arguments Against God from Thermodynamics,” a talk by Larry Ford, Prof. of Physics (Tufts University), based in part on Victor Stenger, God: The Failed Hypothesis (2008), pp. 115-21. Location: Tufts University, Rm. 152 in Robinson Hall, 212 College Ave., Medford. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society: Arguments Against God from Thermodynamics
